summary: This document is an email from TD Ameritrade providing forms requested by a client. It includes instructions for completing and returning the forms, as well as contact information for assistance. The email emphasizes the importance of privacy and offers options for opting out of marketing communications.

persons.name: Judith K. Ricketts
persons.context: Judith K. Ricketts is the sender of the email, providing information and assistance regarding account forms.

keyFacts: The email contains attachments for forms requested by a client.
Judith K. Ricketts is identified as the Managing Director of Investor Services at TD Ameritrade.
The document emphasizes client privacy and options for opting out of marketing communications.
Contact information for TD Ameritrade is provided for further assistance.
The email includes instructions for returning completed forms by mail or fax.
